availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Pendleton Circuit Court
Clerks Office
June 13th 1865

Commonwealth of Ky plff.
vs } Bail
King Plummer deft

King Plummer being in custody charged by an indictment of the Grand Jury of Pendleton Circuit Court with the offense of Bigamy, of the jailor of Pendleton County and, said Circuit Court having by its order directed that he might be admitted to bail in the sum of Two hundred dollars, and having upon his petition under a writ of Habeas Corpus been produced before me by the Jailor aforesaid, and admitted to bail under said order of the Circuit Court, Now I, W. J. Myers of Pendleton County ^Ky^ do hereby undertake that the said King Plummer will appear in the Pendleton Circuit Court on the first day of the next October Term to answer said charge, and will at all times render himself ^amenable to the orders and process of said Court in the prosecution of said charge, and if convicted will render himself* in execution thereof, or if he shall fail to perform either of these conditions that I will pay the Commonwealth of Kentucky the sum of Two hundred dollars,

p.note: *amenable to the orders and prcess of said Court in the prosecution of said charge, if convicted will render himself

body.p: Witness our hands this 9th day of May 1863
Taken & subscribed before me as Presiding Judge of the Pendleton County Court

S. Tho. Hauser.
P. J. P. Cty. Ct

A Copy
att,
C A Wandelohr Clk

Commonwth
vs } Co, Bond
King Plummer
fee 30 cts
